product_name: Thorlo Experia Merino Wool/Silk Running Socks - Men's
long_description: Powered by Thorlo padding and tailored for performance and minimal bulk, the Experia Merino Wool/Silk running socks supply support and moisture movement for great comfort. Polyester, merino wool and silk are blended together to create a wonderfully soft hand with excellent moisture-management properties to keep feet comfortable and dry. Nylon and elastic work to provide a glovelike fit and supply lightweight support across instep and arch while increasing longevity. Medium-density padding under ball, toes and heel helps soak up shock and prevent blisters; lightweight Achilles tendon pad protects against chafing. Flat knit toe seam increases comfort. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Powered by Thorlo padding and tailored for performance and minimal bulk, the Experia Merino Wool/Silk running socks supply support and moisture movement for great comfort.
